pr_title: Allow staff only access when creating new collections or folders

timeline.bodyText:
Can you switch "staffOnly" over to a boolean? You can do @RequestParam(value="staffOnly", defaultValue = "false") boolean staffOnly and spring will translate it appropriately. The service should take a boolean instead of a string as well.
In which case you'll want the admin unit case to pass in false
timeline.author: bbpennel

timeline.bodyText: Should make it so that the patron access stuff only happens for object types other than AdminUnit
timeline.author: bbpennel

timeline.bodyText: isn't the parameter staffOnly rather than patronOnly? That probably needs to be changed in all these tests
timeline.author: bbpennel

replies.bodyText: Can you also verify that the access restriction isn't applied to the object in this case? It'd be best to make a reusable helper method to check that an object doesn't have patron restrictions, and add that to all the tests that aren't trying to add restrictions. Should just be one extra line
replies.author: bbpennel

timeline.bodyText: you can leave the parameter off for this case
timeline.author: bbpennel
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -91,7 +96,8 @@ public void testAddCollectionToAdminUnit() throws UnsupportedOperationException,
     public void testAddAdminUnit() throws Exception {
         String label = "admin_label";
         MvcResult result = mvc.perform(post("/edit/create/adminUnit/" + CONTENT_ROOT_ID)
-                .param("label", label))
+                .param("label", label)
+                .param("patronOnly", (String) null))

timeline.bodyText: The parameter doesn't need to be required, so probably better to leave it off or provide the default value. It would be reasonable to have a separate test to verify the default behavior though.
timeline.author: bbpennel

timeline.bodyText: Would be good to update the test method name to something like testAddFolderStaffOnly
timeline.author: bbpennel

timeline.message: Allow staff only access to contents when creating new collections or folders

* Make parameter a boolean
* Add test assertions

* Make parameter a boolean
* Add test assertions

* Make parameter a boolean
* Add test assertions
Dry up finding member in test
